name: Count after creating multiple tasks
userPrompt: Create 3 more tasks: review PR, write tests, deploy. Then tell me how many tasks I have total.
expectedBehavior: Should create 3 tasks, then report 8 total tasks

name: Count after deleting some tasks
userPrompt: Delete task1, task2, and task3. How many tasks do I have now?
expectedBehavior: Should delete 3 tasks, report 7 remaining

name: Count mixed entity types after operations
userPrompt: Add 2 more events and 1 task. What's my total count now?
expectedBehavior: Should report 6 tasks, 5 events, 2 notes, 1 goal

name: Count only urgent tasks
userPrompt: How many urgent tasks do I have?
expectedBehavior: Should count and report only urgent tasks from context

name: Count after delete all confirmation
userPrompt: Delete all tasks. How many do I have left?
expectedBehavior: Should report 0 tasks after deletion

name: Convert task to event
userPrompt: Actually, that test task should be a meeting at 2pm tomorrow
expectedBehavior: Should acknowledge conversion need (AI may ask for confirmation)

name: Convert event to task
userPrompt: Change that test event to a task instead, it's not really a scheduled meeting
expectedBehavior: Should acknowledge conversion need

name: Task with time is NOT an event
userPrompt: I need to finish the report by 5pm Friday
expectedBehavior: Should create TASK with dueDate and dueTime, NOT event

name: Multiple format changes in sequence
userPrompt: Make task1 urgent, change task2 to an event at 3pm, and update the event location to Room 5
expectedBehavior: Should handle multiple different operations

name: Add time to existing task
userPrompt: Update the test task to be due Friday at 3pm
expectedBehavior: Should add dueDate and dueTime to existing task

name: Create 20 tasks at once
userPrompt: Create 20 tasks for me with titles task1 through task20
expectedBehavior: Should create exactly 20 tasks, no duplicates

name: Delete all tasks and all events
userPrompt: Clear all my tasks and events
expectedBehavior: Should delete all tasks and events, keep notes and goals

name: Mark multiple tasks urgent
userPrompt: Mark task1, task2, and task3 as urgent
expectedBehavior: Should update 3 tasks to urgent=true

name: Create 10 events with different times
userPrompt: Schedule 10 meetings: Monday-Friday at 9am and 2pm each day
expectedBehavior: Should create exactly 10 events with correct times

name: Update all tasks to add due date
userPrompt: Set all tasks to be due next Friday
expectedBehavior: Should update all 5 tasks with same dueDate

name: Delete completed tasks only
userPrompt: Delete all completed tasks
expectedBehavior: Should only delete completed tasks, keep incomplete ones

name: Chain of operations with counting
userPrompt: Add 5 tasks, delete 2 tasks, create 3 events, then tell me my totals
expectedBehavior: Should execute all operations and report final counts

name: Conditional operations
userPrompt: If I have more than 5 tasks, mark the oldest 3 as important
expectedBehavior: Should check count and perform conditional update

name: Create task with all possible fields
userPrompt: Create urgent important task: Q4 Report due Friday Nov 15 at 5pm, estimated 3 hours, tags: work, deadline
expectedBehavior: Task with all fields populated correctly

name: Reorganize schedule
userPrompt: Move all events to next week and mark all tasks as due this Friday
expectedBehavior: Should update all events' dates and all tasks' dueDates

name: Create recurring events
userPrompt: Schedule team standup every Monday at 9am for the next 4 weeks
expectedBehavior: Should create 4 events or indicate recurring pattern

name: Empty string task title
userPrompt: Create a task with title ''
expectedBehavior: Should handle gracefully or reject

name: Duplicate task titles
userPrompt: Create task: test task
expectedBehavior: Should allow duplicate or warn user

name: Delete non-existent task
userPrompt: Delete the xyz task
expectedBehavior: Should indicate task not found

name: Update with conflicting fields
userPrompt: Update test task to be urgent but not important, and also important
expectedBehavior: Should handle conflicting instructions gracefully

name: Task with past due date
userPrompt: Create task due yesterday
expectedBehavior: Should create task with past date or warn

name: Workshop vs work task
userPrompt: Attend workshop on React testing next Tuesday 2pm
expectedBehavior: Should create EVENT (workshop = class/event), not task

name: Submit by deadline
userPrompt: Submit application by midnight tonight
expectedBehavior: Should create TASK with deadline, not event

name: Call during specific time
userPrompt: Call client between 2-3pm
expectedBehavior: Should create TASK (call = action), time is suggestion not appointment

name: Phone interview
userPrompt: Phone interview with candidate tomorrow at 10am
expectedBehavior: Should create EVENT (interview = scheduled appointment)

name: Deadline with scheduled time
userPrompt: Presentation due Monday, but I'm presenting at 2pm
expectedBehavior: Should create both: TASK for preparation and EVENT for presentation

name: Create 15 tasks rapid fire
userPrompt: Create tasks: alpha, beta, gamma, delta, epsilon, zeta, eta, theta, iota, kappa, lambda, mu, nu, xi, omicron
expectedBehavior: Should create 15 tasks with no JSON visible in chat

name: Complex multi-operation with events and tasks
userPrompt: Create 5 tasks for this week, schedule 3 meetings tomorrow, and delete 2 old tasks
expectedBehavior: No JSON markers or brackets in cleaned response

name: Update 10 tasks at once
userPrompt: Mark all 10 tasks as important and urgent
expectedBehavior: No JSON leaks despite bulk operation

name: Mixed creates and deletes
userPrompt: Delete task1 and event1, create 3 new tasks and 2 new events
expectedBehavior: Clean response with no JSON artifacts

name: Rapid sequence of commands
userPrompt: Create task A. Delete task A. Create task B. Update task B to urgent. Delete task B.
expectedBehavior: Should handle sequence without JSON leaks

name: Reference previous count
userPrompt: I have 7 tasks right? Add 3 more to make it an even 10
expectedBehavior: Should confirm count and create 3 tasks

name: Relative updates
userPrompt: Make the first 3 tasks urgent
expectedBehavior: Should update first 3 tasks based on order

name: Workspace summary request
userPrompt: Give me a full summary of everything in my workspace
expectedBehavior: Should report all counts: 12 tasks, 8 events, 5 notes, 3 goals

name: Clean slate request
userPrompt: Delete everything, I want to start fresh
expectedBehavior: Should ask for confirmation before deleting all data
